item.title: About Me
item.description: EXPERIENCE Deloitte | Azure Cloud Engineer July 2021 - Present Deploy and maintain Infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code tools such as Azure Resource Manager (ARM) and Bicep templates Develop and maintain cloud solutions Identify, analyze and resolve infrastructure vulnerabilities and application deployment issues Work on automation using scripting languages such as PowerShell and Bash Setup CI/CD Pipelines using Azure Pipelines Review existing systems and make/recommend improvements Work as Scrum Master to ensure that sprints go smoothly and the backlog is up-to-date Deloitte | SQL DBA Azure Engineer March 2019 - July 2021
